description: Great that you want to start using the application. Please notice that the application is meant for people who are at least 15. If you're under 15, please visit
requiredFieldInfo: Fields marked with a star * are required.
usernameTooltip: Your username has to be at least 2 characters long.
tryAgainMessage: We weren't able to check your username. Please try again in a moment.
passwordTooltip: Your password has to be at least 8 characters long.
emailFieldInfo: Providing an email address enables you to recover a forgotten password. Your email isn't used for other purposes.
displayNameTooltip: Your display name has to be at least 2 characters long
displayNameFieldInfo: Provided a display name that can't be identified, if you want to use the application anonymously.
privacyParagraph1: We only use your data and message history to make this service possible. We follow high security standards and do our best to keep your conversations private and safe.
privacyParagraph2: Please note that we use anonymous statistics to evaluate the service and its usefulness.
privacyParagraph3: By continuing you agree to trust us with your data. Read these for more details:
privacyConsentSwitch: I approve the use of my information
submitError: Form submission failed. Please try again in a moment
